definition: not in such a way as to/not likely to
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: John Tsang should come to a decision that will save the accountability system from becoming a joke again.
sentences.chinese: 曾俊華應該有所抉擇，使問責制不致再次成爲笑話。

sentences.english: No serious man wastes his time in discussing such a terminological question.
sentences.chinese: 嚴肅的人不致浪費時問來討論像這樣的用語上的問題。

sentences.english: Wrap a Sir, I miss your original meaning probably unlikely inferior get such?
sentences.chinese: 包先生，我想你們的本意大概不致於拙劣得如此吧？

sentences.english: Thus, even if some of the investment losses, not worth.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，即使一些投資受了損失，也不致於滿盤皆輸。

sentences.english: I told Doug to hurry up so that we wouldn't be late.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴多格快一點纔不致於遲到。

sentences.english: The wires in circuits are kept from heating by either fuses or circuit breakers.
sentences.chinese: 保險絲或斷電器可以保護電路中的電線不致過熱。

sentences.english: I'm not so simple as to think it will be easy.
sentences.chinese: 我決不致於笨得以爲那是容易的事。

sentences.english: Carl attempted to save the company from the bankruptcy but failed.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾試圖挽救公司不致破產但是失敗了。

sentences.english: They w ere campaigning to keep the local school open.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲使當地學校不致關閉而奔走活動。

sentences.english: It was hope that held my nerves from shock.
sentences.chinese: 只是懷着一線希望，我纔不致喪魂落魄。

sentences.english: You must take measures in order that such mistakes may never be made again.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不致重犯這類錯誤，你必須採取措施。

sentences.english: Meat is basted to keep it from drying out and to improve its flavour.
sentences.chinese: 烤肉時潤以脂油使不致烤焦並可增加香味。

sentences.english: The upper ink roller is equipped with load-free system that prevents ink from getting dried when machine is running.
sentences.chinese: 上墨膠輥自動空轉系統，機械轉動時油墨不致乾涸。

sentences.english: The intact carcass of the prehistoric animal was prevented from putrefying by the arctic cold.
sentences.chinese: 屍體，是由於北極嚴寒的保護不致腐爛。

sentences.english: He is above meanness and deceit.
sentences.chinese: 他不致於做出卑劣和欺騙的事情來。

sentences.english: The organ will not be reduced or rendered rudimentary at this early age.
sentences.chinese: 器官在早的齡期內不致被縮小或呈退化狀態。

definition: to such an extent as to/down to/up to
to be saved from/to be spared (something)
down to/up to/to such an extent as to .../also written 以至於|以至于[yi3 zhi4 yu2]
